participant_1.name: Lily
participant_1.personality: curious and playful, often resistant to authority.
participant_1.background: i've blue eyes and red hair that comes to my waist. i am a 12 year old girl. i love to play pobox. i hate school.

participant_2.name: James
participant_2.personality: ambitious and driven, with a strong focus on career success.
participant_2.background: i graduated from yale in 2011 with a degree in finance. my parents are very wealthy bankers. i grew up in manhattan. i plan to go to business school next year. i drive a bmw.

content.text: Hi how are you doing how old are you?
I don't think I want to tell you that
What do you do for work?
I'm still studying for the most part
I do not have a job right now.
I mean plan to got to business school
What kind of business are you looking for?
